question: Which of the following is a comprehensive scheme launched by the Ministry of Women and Child Development for Prevention of Trafficking and Rescue, Rehabilitation & Re-Integration of Victims of Trafficking?
explanation: The Ministry of Women and Child Development is implementing “Ujjawala”- a Comprehensive Scheme for Prevention of Trafficking and Rescue, Rehabilitation, Re-integration and Repatriation of Victims of Trafficking. Under this scheme, more than 150 Protective and Rehabilitative Homes have been built. These rehabilitative centres are given financial support for providing shelter and basic amenities such as food, clothing, medical care, legal aid; education in the case the victims are children, as well as for undertaking vocational training and income generation activities to provide the victims with alternate livelihood option.
